title: Collage Creator

descriptionText: The first part of a chess engine. I completely implemented all of the functionalities for chess including checkmate, en-passant, and promoting.

title: OpenGL Clock
descriptionText: My final project for my Computer Graphics class, a real-time clock in OpenGL
